paypal_balance.name: PayPal Balance
terms: You MUST send from your PayPal balance only
You MUST provide a screenshot showing balance send
DO NOT use credit cards, debit cards, or bank transfers
Sending with cards may result in loss of funds (no refunds)
PayPal may freeze your account if you use cards for crypto
We are NOT responsible for PayPal account restrictions
risks: Your account may be limited or banned
Chargebacks are NOT allowed and will result in permanent ban

paypal_goods.name: paypal_goods
terms: Higher fees apply (PayPal G&S fee + our fee)
DO NOT open disputes or chargebacks
Opening a dispute will result in permanent ban
This option is for buyers who want extra protection
Exchanger is protected by our escrow system
risks: Transactions may be reversed by PayPal

cashapp.name: cashapp
terms: You MUST send from your CashApp balance
Provide your $cashtag for exchanger to send to
Include your ticket ID in the note/memo
DO NOT use credit cards (will be declined or reversed)
CashApp prohibits crypto transactions - use at own risk

venmo.name: venmo
terms: MUST use Friends & Family option
DO NOT select goods or services
DO NOT mention crypto in notes
Keep transaction description generic (e.g., 'Thanks!', 'Dinner')
Venmo prohibits crypto - use at own risk
risks: No refunds if account is frozen

zelle.name: zelle
terms: Verify recipient details carefully
Transactions are IRREVERSIBLE
Double-check phone/email before sending
Include ticket ID if asked
Zelle is generally crypto-friendly
risks: Bank may ask questions about crypto

bank_transfer.name: bank_transfer
terms: Include reference number provided by exchanger
Transactions may take 1-3 business days
Keep receipt/confirmation for your records
International transfers may have additional fees
Verify bank details carefully
risks: Incorrect details may result in lost funds

chime.name: chime
terms: Send via Chime Pay
DO NOT mention crypto in transaction notes
Chime may restrict accounts for crypto activity
Keep notes generic

applepay.name: applepay
terms: Send from Apple Cash balance
DO NOT use linked credit/debit cards
Keep notes generic - no crypto mentions
Provide Apple ID email for verification
risks: Credit card use may trigger fraud alerts

crypto.name: crypto
terms: Verify wallet address carefully (copy/paste, don't type)
Transactions are IRREVERSIBLE
You are responsible for network fees
Wait for required confirmations
Double-check network (ERC-20, BTC, TRC-20, etc.)
We are NOT responsible for wrong address sends
risks: Sending to wrong address = permanent loss
Network fees may be high during congestion
Confirmations may take longer during high traffic
Wrong network selection will result in lost funds
